_header: God that is so full of might
_description: A prayer tag by John Crophill — one couplet

BLHar1735.Transcription:
God þat is so foul of meghtSaue har soulys bothe day &
                    neght
BLHar1735.Note:
Folio number reflects the most recent foliation. This text is copied
                    again by another hand directly below it, with slight variations in spelling:
                    ‘God that ys so ffoll of mytht / Saue haur Soulys Bothe day &
                    nyth’.
